thread.title: High school football games postponed again
thread.title_full: High school football games postponed again

title: High school football games postponed again
text: Email Facebook @jeff_fromthepc Oct 4 2015 5:28 pm With Charleston County schools closed Monday, high school football games at district schools set for Monday have been postponed again due to recent heavy rain and flooding. Those games, already postponed from last Friday, are now scheduled for Tuesday, weather permitting, according to Charleston County athletic director Dave Spurlock. Spurlock said teams can play two games in one week, but he is suggesting that Friday’s regularly scheduled games be moved to Saturday. “I don’t know how many of our schools will decide to do that, but that’s my suggestion,” Spurlock said. Berkeley and Dorchester county schools also are closed Monday, putting off their games for at least another day, as well. Here’s a list of High School League games postponed from last Friday and tentatively set for Tuesday: Ashley Ridge at Goose Creek Military Magnet at Lincoln
